description: Deterministic cache of expanded currency→country weights.
Per-merchant settlement currency κₘ with provenance.
Predictor matrix for hurdle (single vs multi-site) decision.
Per-merchant hurdle probabilities (π) after logistic model.
Per-currency sparsity flags emitted by currency→country expansion.
Flags enforcing cross-border eligibility rules prior to ZTP.
Legacy RNG-dependent allocation set; superseded by S3 ordered candidate set. Not authoritative for inter-country order.
Optional convenience surface of selected foreign ISO2s per merchant; authority remains S6 RNG events; no inter-country order encoded.
PASS receipt for S6; gate for S7/S8 reads.
Legacy residual cache for RNG integerisation; superseded by S3 deterministic integerised counts (parameter-scoped).

Immutable outlet stubs per merchant × legal_country. Does NOT encode cross-country order; consumers MUST join `s3_candidate_set.candidate_rank` for that. Consumers MUST only read after verifying `_passed.flag` matches SHA256(`validation_bundle_1A`) for the same fingerprint (see S9.9).
Deterministic ordered candidate set per merchant; single authority for inter-country order (`candidate_rank`).
Deterministic base-weight priors (fixed-dp strings) per candidate; not probabilities.
Deterministic per-country integer counts summing to N; includes residual_rank.
Deterministic within-country site sequence (and optional 6-digit site_id).
Diagnostics for hurdle model stability across vintages.
Per-merchant deterministic features used by cross-border K (currently: openness scalar X_m in [0,1]).
Merchant-scoped abort log for soft failures (does not replace run abort).
Root sealing receipt for 1A; records run lineage and the sealed input inventory.
Authoritative inventory of every asset sealed by 1A.S0 for the manifest.
Validator outputs for 1A (metrics, plots, diffs).
index.json enumerating validation bundle members with hashes.
HashGate PASS flag for the 1A validation bundle.
Run-scoped RNG audit log (master seed, counters, substream jumps).

Structured per-(module,substream_label) RNG trace (saturating totals for draws/blocks/events; `draws_total` equals the sum of event-level draws; `blocks_total` reconciled via counters). Emit exactly one cumulative row after each RNG event append (per S4 §2A).
Event stream: hurdle Bernoulli draws per merchant (π).
Event stream: gamma draws for NB/Dirichlet components.
Event stream: Poisson draws used in NB composition / ZTP.
Event stream: final Negative Binomial draws for outlet counts.
Event stream: ZTP rejection samples and acceptance traces.
Event stream: ZTP retry exhaustion (diagnostic hard events).
Event stream: S4 single acceptance record per resolved merchant (fixes K_target and run facts).
Event stream: Gumbel-top-k keys for foreign-country selection.
Event stream: Dirichlet gamma vectors for splitting outlets across countries.
Event stream: explicit Philox stream/substream jump records.
Event stream: standard normal draws via Box–Muller (Z only; sine mate discarded).
Event stream: final sequence allocation per (merchant,country) block.
Event stream: deterministic ranks of largest-remainder residuals for per-country integerisation.
Event stream: guardrail events when site sequence space is exhausted.
Layer-1 segment-state run-report (JSONL), one row per state invocation.
Fingerprint-scoped receipt proving 1A PASS verification; enumerates sealed inputs for 1B.
Authoritative inventory of every asset sealed by 1B.S0 for the manifest.
Eligible raster cells per country after clip.
Control-plane run report for S1 tile index publish.
Deterministic fixed-dp weights per tile.
Control-plane run report for S2 tile weights publish.
Deterministic site counts per (merchant_id, legal_country_iso) for this run.
Control-plane counters and receipts for S3 requirements publish.
Per-tile integer allocations that sum to S3 n_sites (RNG-free; positives only).
Control-plane counters and receipts for S4 allocation publish.
Site→tile assignment; one row per site; satisfies S4 per-tile quotas.
Control-plane counters and receipts for S5 site→tile assignment publish.
Per-site in-pixel jitter; effective deltas (projection into country); one row per site.
Control-plane counters and RNG coverage for S6 jitter publish.
Rectangle bounds per eligible tile (S1 companion to tile_index).
Deterministic stitch of S5 (tile) + S6 (effective deltas) + S1 geometry into per-site absolutes; RNG-free; 1:1 with outlet_catalogue.
Control-plane run summary for S7 site synthesis publish.
Site locations with absolute lat/lon (post jitter + geometry stitch); partitioned by seed/fingerprint.
Control-plane summary for S8 site_locations publish.
Validation bundle for a 1B publish (one per manifest_fingerprint).
index.json enumerating validation bundle members with hashes.
PASS gate flag; equals SHA-256 of the bundle per S9 hashing rule.
RNG events for site→tile assignment (one event per assigned site).
RNG events for S6 in-cell jitter (≥1 event per site; one per attempt; per-event budget; blocks=1, draws=2).
RNG run audit (identity/config) — one row at run start.
RNG cumulative trace — append exactly one row after each event append.
RESERVED (VNext). Gaussian jitter σ (deg) policy by latitude band / merchant class. Not consumed by 1B v1 uniform lane.
Fingerprint-scoped receipt proving 1B PASS and recording sealed inputs for 2A.
Diagnostic inventory of sealed inputs for a 2A fingerprint.
Provisional tz lookup results per site (deterministic).
Final per-site IANA tzid with provenance; order-free egress.
Fingerprint-scoped cache manifest for tz transitions.
Legality/DST report per seed×fingerprint (JSON summary).
Validation bundle for 2A publish (one per fingerprint).
index.json enumerating validation bundle members with hashes.
PASS flag; equals SHA-256 of bundle per index+ASCII-lex law.
Time-zone overrides (governed; precedence site » mcc » country).
Deterministic ε used at borders for tie-breaks; sealed for reproducibility.
Pinned IANA tzdata archive and release tag.
Gate receipt attesting upstream verification, identity, and catalogue-only resolution.
Authoritative inventory of every asset sealed by 2B.S0 for the manifest.
Fingerprint-scoped PASS bundle for Segment 1B; 2B verifies it before any read.
Companion single-line flag carrying the SHA-256 digest of the 1B validation bundle.
Immutable per-site lon/lat coordinates emitted by Segment 1B.
Per-site IANA tzid assignments emitted by 2A; REQUIRED input for 2B v1 tz-grouping + day-effects.
Fingerprint-scoped cache of tz transitions compiled by 2A.
Philox sub-stream layout & RNG budgets for routing states.
Sealed virtual-edge catalogue containing edges, weights, and attributes.
Alias table byte layout, alignment, and decode invariants.
Daily modulation cadence, variance, and clipping configuration for S3.
Frozen per-site probability law emitted by S1 for alias construction.
JSON index describing alias blob slices, offsets, and digests.
Contiguous binary blob containing per-merchant alias tables.
Per-merchant × UTC-day × tz-group gamma multipliers for day-scale co-movement.
Per-merchant × UTC-day × tz-group mix used to pick tz-group prior to static alias.
Optional per-arrival trace for routing selections; arrival-ordered JSONL.
Per-arrival virtual-edge selections captured as a diagnostic log.
RNG run audit (identity/config) - one row at run start for 2B routing runs.
RNG cumulative trace - append exactly one row after each event append for 2B routing runs.
RNG events for 2B.S5 tz-group selection (single-uniform; Stage A).
RNG events for 2B.S5 site selection (single-uniform; Stage B).
RNG events for 2B.S6 virtual-edge pick (single-uniform).
Deterministic audit report emitted by S7 (validators, evidence, run metadata).
Directory artefact containing the 2B validation bundle contents.
index.json enumerating evidence files plus their SHA-256 digests.
Companion flag containing the SHA-256 digest of the 2B validation bundle.
Gate descriptor proving upstream PASS status and sealed policy set.
Sealed inventory of artefacts authorised for Segment 3A.
Per-merchant escalation decisions and totals.
Parameter-scoped Dirichlet α-vectors per country×tzid.
Dirichlet share draws per merchant×country×zone.
RNG run audit (identity/config) - one row at run start for 3A routing runs.
RNG cumulative trace - append exactly one row after each event append for 3A S3 runs.
RNG events for 3A.S3 Dirichlet draws (one per escalated merchant x country).
Integer outlet counts per merchant×country×zone after floor/bump.
Cross-layer zone allocation egress for routing segment.
Digest summary tying priors/policies to the published zone allocation.
Structural validation report emitted by 3A.S6.
Per-issue findings emitted by 3A.S6.
Compact validation receipt capturing S6 outcomes.
Fingerprint-scoped validation bundle for Segment 3A.
HashGate PASS flag accompanying the 3A validation bundle.

Run report for 3A.S1 escalation queue.

Gate receipt capturing upstream PASS status, sealed policy set and authoritative digests.
Inventory of every artefact authorised for the manifest.
Merchant-level classification surface with closed vocabulary reason codes.
One settlement node per virtual merchant with tzid semantics and evidence URLs.
Per-edge geometry, tz semantics and weights for all virtual merchants.
Digest summary and per-merchant counts for the edge catalogue.
Contiguous alias blob covering every virtual merchant edge distribution.
Index and checksum metadata for locating merchant alias segments inside the blob.
Fingerprint-scoped hash tying cdn weights, edge catalogue/index and alias outputs.
Structured Philox audit for any gamma draws in the virtual pipeline.
RNG run audit (identity/config) - one row at run start for 3B S2 runs.
RNG cumulative trace - append exactly one row after each event append for 3B S2 runs.
RNG events for S2 edge tile assignment (one per expanded edge slot).
RNG events for S2 edge jitter attempts (one per attempt).
Dual-TZ routing contract that tells 2B how to consume the virtual artefacts.
Declarative suite of validation tests (IP mix, cut-offs, alias health) scoped to the manifest.
Optional S4 receipt capturing policy digests and status.
Directory artefact containing manifest, digests and structural or RNG evidence.
index.json enumerating evidence files plus their SHA-256 digests.
ASCII _passed.flag storing the hash of the validation bundle.
Optional S5 manifest summarising identity, digests and validator outcomes; lives inside the bundle.
Run report for 3B.S1 virtual classification.
Run report for 3B.S2 edge catalogue.
Run report for 3B.S3 alias packaging.
Run report for 3B.S4 routing policy compilation.
Run report for 3B.S5 validation bundle.
Classing policy for 5A.S1. Maps merchantxzone features to demand_class and optional demand_subclass/profile IDs.
Demand scale policy for 5A.S1/S3. Maps demand_class and merchant features to baseline weekly volume / scale_factor.
Baseline intensity semantics policy for 5A.S3. Defines how S1 scale fields are interpreted (units/constraints) and any clipping/zero-handling rules.
Shape library for 5A.S2. Defines unit-mass shape templates per demand_classxzonexchannel_group (grid lives in shape_time_grid_policy_5A).
Local-week time grid policy for 5A.S2 (bucket size, buckets per week, and bucket_index mapping).
Optional deterministic zone-level modifiers applied after base templates and before normalization in 5A.S2.
Horizon and grid configuration for 5A.S4 scenario overlays (local and UTC).
Scenario metadata pack (scenario IDs, labels, types, and horizon range) sealed by S0.
Scenario calendar for 5A.S4. Defines dated events (holidays, campaigns, outages, stress scenarios) and their scope.
Optional overlay ordering policy for 5A.S4 to define precedence between overlapping scenario events.
Overlay policy for 5A.S4. Maps scenario events to multiplicative factors and defines precedence/combination rules.
Optional overlay validation policy for 5A.S4 to define bounds or warnings for overlay factors.
Optional S5 validation strictness config (tolerances, warn corridors, blocking rules).
Optional S5 config declaring compatible S1-S4 spec-version combinations.
Fingerprint-scoped S0 receipt confirming upstream gates and sealed inputs.
Inventory of sealed artefacts 5A is allowed to read for a fingerprint.
Scenario-level manifest projection derived from sealed inputs.
Merchant×zone demand profile including class and scale for the local week.
Merchant-level aggregate class profile derived deterministically from zone profiles.
Local-week time grid definition for shapes under a parameter pack and scenario.
Normalised weekly shape vectors per class×zone (and optional channel) for each scenario.
Optional base shape catalogue per class (and optional channel) for each scenario.
Merchant×zone baseline local-week intensities per scenario.
Optional class×zone baseline local-week intensities per scenario.
Optional merchant×zone baseline intensities expressed on a UTC grid.
Scenario-adjusted local-week intensities per merchant×zone×horizon bucket.
Optional multiplicative overlay factors per merchant×zone×horizon bucket.
Scenario-adjusted UTC intensities per merchant×zone×UTC horizon bucket.

HashGate flag proving the validation bundle digest for a fingerprint.
Global run-report journal for layer2 segment states.
Layer-3 / Segment 6A gate receipt. One row per manifest_fingerprint, summarising upstream gates and the sealed input universe for 6A.
Manifest of all artefacts 6A is authorised to depend on for a given manifest_fingerprint, with roles, digests, and read scopes.
Population priors pack for 6A (world/region totals, mixtures, demographics).
Segmentation priors for 6A (party_type/segment mixes and region splits).
Party/segment/region taxonomies for 6A.

Graph/linkage rules for 6A.S4 (device/IP sharing, degree caps, deterministic tie-breaks).
Device-specific linkage rules for 6A.S4 (sharing patterns and degree caps).

Base party/customer universe for Layer-3 / Segment 6A. One row per party per (manifest_fingerprint, seed), including type, home geography and static segment attributes.
Aggregate view of the 6A party base, providing party counts by geography, segment and type for diagnostics and downstream sizing.
Account and product universe for Layer-3 / Segment 6A. One row per account per (manifest_fingerprint, seed), including owner references, account type, currency and static account attributes.
Per-party product holdings for Layer-3 / Segment 6A, derived from s2_account_base_6A and s1_party_base_6A. One row per party and product grouping (e.g. account_type), with account counts.
Merchant-centric view of accounts where a merchant is an owner (e.g. settlement or acquiring accounts). Pure subset of s2_account_base_6A.
Aggregate view of the 6A account base, providing account counts by geography, segment and account type for diagnostics and sizing.

Instrument and payment-credential universe for Layer-3 / Segment 6A. One row per instrument per (manifest_fingerprint, seed), including owner account, owner party/merchant (if modelled), instrument type, scheme/network, masked identifier, expiry, and static flags.

Per-account instrument linkage surface for Layer-3 / Segment 6A. Derived from s3_instrument_base_6A and s2_account_base_6A; provides either per-instrument or aggregated per-account, per-instrument-type views of instrument ownership.
Per-party instrument holdings for Layer-3 / Segment 6A, derived from s3_instrument_base_6A and s1_party_base_6A; one row per (party_id, instrument grouping) with instrument_count.
Aggregate instrument diagnostics for Layer-3 / Segment 6A, providing instrument counts by geography, segment, account_type and instrument_type.
Device universe for Layer-3 / Segment 6A. One row per device per (manifest_fingerprint, seed), with device classification, primary owner context and static device risk/capability flags.
IP / network endpoint universe for Layer-3 / Segment 6A. One row per IP/endpoint per (manifest_fingerprint, seed), including masked representation, ip_type, asn_class, geo hints and static risk tags.
Device-to-entity edges for Layer-3 / Segment 6A. Links each device_id to one or more parties/accounts/instruments/merchants with a link_role describing the semantics.
IP-to-device/entity edges for Layer-3 / Segment 6A. Links each ip_id to one or more devices/parties/merchants with a link_role describing the semantics.
Per-entity graph neighbourhood metrics for Layer-3 / Segment 6A (devices per party, IPs per device, shared-device/shared-IP degrees, etc.), derived from S4 base and link datasets.
Aggregate graph diagnostics for Layer-3 / Segment 6A: degree distributions and sharing summaries per region/segment/account_type and globally.
Static fraud posture for parties in Layer-3 / Segment 6A. One row per party per (manifest_fingerprint, seed).
Static fraud posture for accounts in Layer-3 / Segment 6A. One row per account per (manifest_fingerprint, seed).
Static fraud posture for merchants in Layer-3 / Segment 6A. One row per merchant, keyed by merchant_id.
Static fraud posture for devices in Layer-3 / Segment 6A. One row per device per (manifest_fingerprint, seed).
Static fraud posture for IPs/endpoints in Layer-3 / Segment 6A. One row per ip_id per (manifest_fingerprint, seed).
Segment-level validation report for Layer-3 / Segment 6A, summarising the results of S5 checks across S1–S4 and S5 fraud roles.
Row-level issue table for 6A validation, containing one row per failing/borderline check instance.
Validation bundle directory for Layer-3 / Segment 6A, containing the evidence index and HashGate outputs for this manifest_fingerprint.
Index for the Layer-3 / Segment 6A validation bundle, listing all evidence files and their SHA-256 digests.
HashGate flag for Layer-3 / Segment 6A. Contains the SHA-256 digest over the validation bundle for this manifest_fingerprint.
Behavioural gate receipt for 6B; one JSON object per manifest_fingerprint summarising upstream gates, contracts_6B and sealed_inputs_digest_6B.
Sealed list of all artefacts 6B is allowed to read for a given manifest_fingerprint, with roles, schema_refs and digests.
Attachment policy for entity selection and linking (S1).
Session key and inactivity gap policy (S1).
Optional feature flags and guardrails for 6B behaviour.
Behaviour priors pack for 6B (distributions/parameters used by S1-S4; sealed by S0).
Layer-3 RNG profile (Philox parameters and invariants).
RNG family mapping for S1 decision families.
Flow shape policy for S2.
Amount model policy for S2.
Timing policy for S2.
RNG policy for S2 flows.

Fraud overlay policy for S3.
RNG policy for S3 fraud overlays.

Bank-view policy for S4.
Delay models for S4.
Case policy for S4.
RNG policy for S4 labelling.
Segment validation policy for S5.
Run-scoped RNG audit envelope for 6B runs.
Aggregated RNG trace log for 6B runs (per event family draws/blocks).
RNG events for 6B.S2 baseline flow anchor draws.
RNG events for 6B.S2 baseline event stream draws.
RNG events for 6B.S3 fraud campaign selection.
RNG events for 6B.S3 fraud overlay application.
RNG events for 6B.S4 truth-label sampling.
RNG events for 6B.S4 bank-view label sampling.
Arrival events from 5B enriched with entity attachments and session identifiers for Layer-3 behaviour; one row per arrival.
Session index for 6B arrivals; one row per session with party/device/IP relationships and anchor metadata.
Baseline flow anchors (all-legit) for 6B. One row per flow_id per (seed, manifest_fingerprint, scenario_id).
Baseline event stream for each flow (auth/clearing/refund/etc.).
Catalogue of realised fraud/abuse campaigns with campaign_id, fraud_type, parameters and the flows affected.
Flow anchors after fraud overlays and campaign adjustments are applied.
Event stream after fraud overlays. Contains synthetic fraud behaviours for training/labelling flows.
Flow-level ground truth labels used by 4A/4B and model training.
Bank-view classification of each flow (what the institution sees / would act on).
Event-level truth and bank-view labels keyed to s3_event_stream_with_fraud_6B.
Case timeline events for flows promoted to manual review or automated cases.
Segment 6B world-level validation report; one JSON document summarising the results of S5 checks across S1-S4 artefacts.
Structured list of validation issues for 6B (one row per failing/warning check).
World-level validation bundle for Segment 6B; directory of validation artefacts plus index.json and _passed.flag.
Index for the Segment 6B validation bundle, listing evidence files and their SHA-256 digests.
Segment 6B HashGate flag; encodes SHA-256 digest over the 6B validation bundle.
